mapper.select: select reply_no, no, depth, reply_group, id, content, date_format(writedate, '%y년%m월%d일%h시%i분') writedate from reply_community where no=${param1} order by reply_group asc, depth asc
mapper.insert:
select ifnull(MAX(reply_group), 0) + 1 from reply_community
insert into reply_community(no, id, content, depth, reply_group) values(#{no}, #{id}, #{content}, #{depth}, #{reply_group})
mapper.update: update reply_community set content=#{content} where reply_no=${reply_no} and id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from reply_community where reply_no=${param1} and id=#{param2}
mapper.insert: insert into reply_community(no, reply_group, depth, id, content) values(#{no}, #{reply_group}, #{depth}, #{id}, #{content})
